body_html:
This is not planned, and we are no longer encouraging users to depend on TensorFlow's implementation of flag parsing (which is a simple wrapper around argparse, used for our example scripts).

If you need specific features from python-gflags, we'd encourage you to depend on that library directly.
body_text:
This is not planned, and we are no longer encouraging users to depend on TensorFlow's implementation of flag parsing (which is a simple wrapper around argparse, used for our example scripts).
If you need specific features from python-gflags, we'd encourage you to depend on that library directly.
body:
This is not planned, and we are no longer encouraging users to depend on TensorFlow's implementation of flag parsing (which is a simple wrapper around `argparse`, used for our example scripts).

If you need specific features from [`python-gflags`](https://github.com/google/python-gflags), we'd encourage you to depend on that library directly.
